summary: This document appears to be notes from a December 5, 2021 meeting preparing a witness for trial testimony in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It references the witness being shown exhibits, confirming details about her first meeting with Jeffrey Epstein, and describing an incident at Maxwell's house.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as 'GM'. The witness describes being at her house, seeing her with a young girl, and being asked to introduce that girl to Jeffrey Epstein. The witness was often at Epstein's residences with both Maxwell and Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE'. The witness confirms details about her first meeting with him, including her weight at the time. She describes being at his residences with him and Ghislaine Maxwell, and notes he would insist she not be intoxicated.

connections.description: The witness describes being often at Epstein's residences with both Maxwell and Epstein together, indicating their close association in the context of the alleged activities.
Maxwell is described as suggesting a young girl would be 'perfect to introduce to JE', indicating a social connection where Maxwell facilitated introductions to Epstein.

events.title: Witness Meeting with Prosecution
events.description: A meeting on December 5, 2021 to prepare a witness for trial testimony in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The witness was shown exhibits (GX 702, GX 16) and discussed details of her experiences.

events.title: Witness's First Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The witness recalls meeting Jeffrey Epstein for the first time when she weighed about 95 pounds.

events.title: Incident at Ghislaine Maxwell's Townhouse
events.description: The witness was at Ghislaine Maxwell's townhouse and saw a young, blonde, slim girl having tea with Maxwell. Maxwell asked the witness why the girl was there and said she would be perfect to introduce to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Undisclosed Incident
events.description: The witness references an incident that occurred when she was approximately 17 years old, but is unsure if it was before or after meeting Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A witness was shown exhibit GX 702 and confirmed it depicted the outside of Ghislaine Maxwell's townhouse.
The witness was shown exhibit GX 16 and confirmed it was her birth certificate.
The witness weighed about 95 pounds when she first met Jeffrey Epstein.
The witness describes Ghislaine Maxwell identifying a young girl at her house as 'perfect to introduce to JE'.
Jeffrey Epstein would insist that the witness not be intoxicated when she was with him and Ghislaine Maxwell.
